eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Lamar, MS; AT 01:19 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:19 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 911 OUTAGE for Lamar County The State 911 system has had a critical incident and 911 may not be available from a cellular phone. You can still call 911 from a landline phone. If you have an emergency you can contact 911 dispatch at the following numbers: 601-596-7082, 769-456-1538, 769-456-1629, 769-456-1136, 769-456-1450
